#   Ahrefs is known primarily as a backlink authority checker, however, it also is an SEO software
#   suite that contains tools for link building, keyword research, competitor analysis, rank tracking
#   and site audits. Most of the features inside Ahrefs are designed for marketing professionals.
#
#   Ahrefs is known for its backlink checker because it has one of the largest databases of live
#   links. It uses crawling software to recreate your site how a search engine sees it. This helps
#   you understand your site better so you can optimize it for search engines.
